Utilize leftover food with these unique recipes

DECIDER

	Still confused?
Let us decide what's best for you!
Still confused?\nLet us decide what\'s best for you!
Please select the type of your feedback
Alright… Tell us what you think

"There is no love sincere than the love of food…" 

But what if someday you have to cook your own food but have no idea how to? 
Don't worry! You have an app that is developed just for foodies like you who love to eat, but learning to cook!! 

Fat Cat Foodie is a unique recipe app that provides simple and cost efficient food recipes which require minimal cooking skills. Conveniently feed yourself without burning a hole in your pocket. 

 Want to impress your friends and family with some great dishes? Fat Cat Foodie's here to help you! You can view different types of recipes & food options according to any cuisine, budget, or preparation time. 

Amateur cooks can upload their own recipes to be featured on our app and users can also share their favorite recipes with friends and family. 

We also have other features for absolute beginners such as quantity measurement guide, basic kitchen tips & tricks etc. You can even view the health value of each recipe and keep your calorie intake in check! 

No more worries about surprise guest visits. With Fat Cat Foodie in your pocket, you can easily prepare instant snacks for your guests… or for a house party… or just to satisfy your hunger pangs! And don't you throw away that leftover food after your satiated guests are gone! Since we have for you some amazing ways to re-utilize your excess food and come up with yet another great dish! 

Cool, isn't it? So hop on this food-ride with Fat Cat Foodie and fall in love with cooking!!

Don\'t just get inspired from our recipes! We would love to learn from you too!! Have any signature recipe up your sleeve? Please share it with us and we will make sure to get it featured on Fat Cat Foodie along with your credits!

• Your uploaded recipe won't get featured on the app immediately. Once you submit it, it will undergo thorough inspection and accordingly decision would be made regarding the acceptance of the recipe. You will be informed about the status of acceptance of your recipe through e-mail.

 • No obscene language would be tolerated.

 • If the recipe you submit is inspired or adapted from another recipe you found, make sure you mention the source.

 • Any recipes discovered to be fraudulent will be deleted without any prior notice.

 • By posting a recipe and accompanying content on Fat Cat Foodie, you are representing to us that, to the best of your knowledge, the recipe and the content does not infringe the rights of another, and are granting to us permission to edit and publish the recipe and the content on this app for others to use and copy free of charge.

 • We reserve the right to remove a recipe from this app for any reason, including claims of copyright or trademark infringement.

 • For any further queries, contact us on poorvadsurve@gmail.com

 • That's it from our side! Happy Cooking!♥
Select the ingredients you have and we will display recipes which can be made just using your ingredients:
Basic ingredients such as salt, sugar, water etc. are presumed to be generally available in every household and hence are not listed below
Checkout exotic recipes from a wide range of cuisines…\n\n

Less cash but much hunger?

Don't worry, we've got you covered! 

Here we bring for you recipes approved by both- 
your wallet and your tastebuds!

Unexpected guests?

Hunger pangs out of control? 

Need to cook something real quick??

Calm down! 
These recipes would be ready even sooner than your pizza gets delivered!

For your brunch or your house party… 
perfect for any occasion! 

Easy and delicious appetizers sure to make them ask for more!

The second best feeling in the world is eating to your heart's content. 

The first?
Enjoying it with your people! 

Delight your friends and family with a scrumptious meal …made by you!

STRESSED in your life? 
Flip it over & you'll have DESSERTS in your life! 

Go on… cheat your diet & pamper yourself with these lipsmacking delicacies! 

Nobody says no to desserts!

Craving for yummy food but getting health conscious? 
Who said healthy can't be tasty?! 

Here are recipes which will lift up your mood but not your calories!

So your guests have left and here you are.. thinking what to do with all that extra food! 
We've all been there and we're here to your food's rescue! 

Try these upcycling recipes and turn that leftover food into a new magical dish!
